title: Anonymous Podcast For People to Vent Things Out
selftext:
Hi,

We are doing a Podcast, the show is fully Anonymous, the Hosts, the Guests, Everyone.

We are trying to help people by letting them vent
things out that have been weighing on them for a
long time.

So who can Join?

Anyone can join, all you have to do is just DM us.

We  tweak your voice that way and nobody's gonna know that it was you and you can say whatever you want 

We'd love to have anyone on our Podcast.

If you like the Idea of the Podcast, can you guys
put up a Story on your Insta pages,

It would be a Great deal of help.

If your putting up the story,it might help us build
some credibility and it would help reach more
people.

I Know this is too much to ask for,but if you could
put a story about our page..we would be so
Grateful to you.

Spotify Podcast Link : https://spotify.openinapp.co/hhamd

Insta Page Link : https://insta.openinapp.co/va2qf
